name: Natural: Avoid using WITH LIMIT(xx) in Batch Programs
description: The number of artifacts that have this statement are reported as a violation. The value reported is the actual number of these statements
rationale: This may cause an runtime error in the application whenever the number of records retrieved is bigger than the limit specified: NAT1005 More records found than specified in search limit
sample: FIND EMPLOYEES WITH LIMIT (1000)  NAME = 'SMITH' WHERE FIRST-NAME = 'MARK'

technicalCriteria.name: Efficiency - Memory, Network and Disk Space Management
